title: RewardsOverview
description: Reward data common to both V0 and V1 rewards.

bakingRewardAccount.description: The amount in the baking reward account.

finalizationRewardAccount.description: The amount in the finalization reward account.

foundationTransactionRewards.description: The transaction reward fraction accruing to the foundation (to be paid at next payday).

gasAccount.description: The amount in the GAS account.

nextPaydayMintRate.description: The rate at which CCD will be minted (as a proportion of the total supply) at the next payday

nextPaydayTime.description: The time of the next payday.

protocolVersion.description: Protocol version that applies to these rewards. V0 variant only exists for protocol versions 1, 2, and 3.

totalEncryptedAmount.description: The total CCD in encrypted balances.

totalStakedCapital.description: The total capital put up as stake by bakers and delegators
